extendedInfo.description: Package Tracker Express is a free version of Package Tracker Pro, the best selling package tracking application, which is a solid, stable and handy business tool to help users to track over various shipping carriersâ packages, and provides All-In-One package / parcel tracking solution. Package Tracker Express includes all of the features of Package Tracker Pro except that package status change notification feature is not available in Package Tracker Express and Ad is enabled in the free version.If you run into any issues, please contact us and we will provide free support.Feature list:1. Package tracking (parcel / parcels tracking) of a variety of shipping carriers2. Label/edit/delete package (hint: long touch the tracking #, and the options will pop up)3. Sync tracking # list between PC (sync site) and phone without typing on phone. Using this extra value feature will save you and your team's time.4. Push tracking # to the sync site5. Email tracking information6. Display package route map if available7. Customize your carrier list8. Option to sort package display by package add-on time9. Option to enable group package list by carrier10. Support App2SDThe shipping carriers include: - Aramex - Brazilian Post - Canada Post - City Link - DHL USA - DHL Global Mail - DHL UK - DHL DE / Germany - DPD DE / Germany - Ensenda - Estafeta - FedEx - FedEx SmartPost - FedEx UK - Hongkong Post - Japan Post EMS - LaserShip - Loomis Express - New Zealand Post - Norway Post - OnTrac - Parcelforce - Prestige  - Pitt Ohio - Purolator - Royal Mail   - Singapore Post (Sing Post)  - Spanish Post / Correos Post - Streamlite - Swiss Post - TNT - UPS - UPS Mail Innovations - USPS - Yamato Transport If you have any question about the application and usage, please email us. We will get you back at the earliest time.Tips: long touch a tracking number, you can edit, remove and push the tracking #.

reviews.title: Outstanding and Extremely Useful
reviews.comment: I love this app.  It is so nice to be able to track all my packages from all carriers in one place.
reviews.author: Allan Myslak

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Way easier using the app, then going online and checking the status of a package.
reviews.author: Sopko Farm

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I used to use Parcels... this is so much better just because it works, and it works very well!
reviews.author: Micah Bristol

reviews.title: Great tracking app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, just input the tracking number and you are done.
reviews.author: Michael Scasny

reviews.title: Great way to have all you tracking in one place
reviews.comment: I used to have to have 4-5 different apps installed, and bow I have it all in one place. Love it.
reviews.author: Aaron Lesch

reviews.title: Works well. Great time saver.
reviews.comment: Would be cool to have a way to pull in numbers. Copy and paste for each one is a bit slow. We do a lot of eBay sales so this app gives us a quick view of where all our stuff is.  Maybe if app could scan qr code or some faster way than typing each code and not have an error. Works well for what it is but we would likely even buy one that could pull in numbers somehow.
reviews.author: Jamie Carlson

reviews.title: Awesome Tracker
reviews.comment: It is very convenient using this app to track all my packages at different time. The saving of tracking number is a good thing.
reviews.author: Nihanth Reddy Karka

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Not tracking USPS CORRECT.
reviews.author: Antonio C.

reviews.title: Singapore Post is only carrier choice!
reviews.comment: In using a Nexus 10 with Android 4.3. Although I made my carrier selections and did NOT select Singapore Post, it is the only choice this app gives me when trying to add a package.
reviews.author: Larry Lief

reviews.comment: Gr8 apps very useful

reviews.comment: Very well designed, this app it\'s a must have. Good job.
